name: Sex Play - The Sauna
description:
A quick and dirty game made especially for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. You play the role of a man who goes to the sauna and receives a special treatment.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Sex Play - The Sauna will definitely arouse your senses!
Make an appointment to the sauna and flirt with the new receptionist.
Accept her invitation to feel the heat together, and don’t forget to bring a towel with you!
Put her in different positions and let the sweat run down your skin. Be careful, fifteen minutes is more than enough for each session!
This game presents you sexy characters, steamy stories, and high quality graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders
- HD animations
